sentences.sContent: In horticultural applications, perlite is used throughout the world as a component of soilless growing mixes where it provides aeration and optimum moisture retention for superior plant growth.
sentences.sContent_eng: In horticultural applications, perlite is used throughout the world as a component of soilless growing mixes where it provides aeration and optimum moisture retention for superior plant growth.
sentences.sCn: 在园艺应用，珍珠岩是用来作为在世界各地的一个组成部分无土混合增长，提供最佳的通风和湿度保持优势植物生长。
